name: Mam Plan
description:
Mam Plan (I Have a Plan) is a puzzle game, played on a 7x7 board. Some board squares are white, while others have colored tiles on them. The player can make a move by choosing any row or column, then pushing all the colored tiles therein one square left/right or up/down. Tiles already at the edge of the board don't move. The goal is to arrange the tiles in such a way that none of them touches the edge of the board and all the colors are arranged into horizontal or vertical stripes.

There are 44 board layouts that can be chosen and solved. It is possible to undo a move, save the game state in memory or on tape, and review the moves made so far. The player can choose alternate graphics for the tiles to make them easier to tell apart on a black-and-white screen.
